name: Digital Youth Council
membership: Department of the Taoiseach Government Data Protection Forum.
goal: The Digital Youth Council sets out to represent young people in both STEM and Education, to inspire more young people to become involved in STEM, and to create/promote opportunities for young people in STEM.
interests: Communication, Development, Economic and Financial Affairs, Education, Employment and Social Affairs, Enterprise, Information Society, Research and Technology, Youth
euInitiatives: General Data Protection Regulation (specifically Article 8 relating to age of consent).
